title: The mystery of the Mayan calendar revealed.jpg
description: The mystery of the Mayan Calendar and 2012 revealed
comments.comment:
The Mexican institute cautioned Thursday that “Western messianic thought has twisted the cosmovision of ancient civilizations like the Maya.” [no kidding] Its experts said that the Mayas believed that time started and ended with regularity, with nothing apocalyptic occurring at the end.

http://abcnews.go.com/blogs/technology/2011/11/apocalypse-2012-back-on-second-mayan-inscription-uncovered/; +James Gemmell Maybe the Mexican Institute didn't want to do a Harold Camping (get it wrong) ;); So that's why Mayan cut the stone in a round shape (see the picture). Life and reincarnation recycled again and again ...; Given the orbits of the various astronomical enties we find ourselves gravitionally bound to, modelling the calendar as wheels within wheels (within wheels) makes a whole heap of sense. Unfortunately those poor Mayans never got to the point of using the wheel for anything as remotely useful as transport...
